sentence.Network_en: Macmillan must have loathed being judged as a mere appendage to domestic politics.
sentence.Network_cn: 麦克米伦肯定极不喜欢只被当成国内政治的附属品。

sentence.Network_en: An insect appendage consists typically of a limb base and a shaft.
sentence.Network_cn: 昆虫典型的附肢包括肢基体和干.

sentence.Network_en: Most agricultural crops are bred for their seed, seed appendage, or fruit.
sentence.Network_cn: 大多数农作物的育种是为了种子, 种子附属物, 或果实.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... append v 悬挂，附上 appendage n 附属物 appendix n 附录，补遗.
GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... appellation n． 名称，称呼 appendage n． 附加物 appetite n． 胃口，食欲.
医学翻译词汇一_专业词汇_英文阅读网 ... apparatus forceps 器械钳 appendage 附件，附器 appendectomy forceps 阑尾切除钳.

list.abs: atresia 闭锁，无孔，不通atrial appendage 心耳atrial canula 心房套管
uterine adnexa 子宫附件uterine appendages 子宫附件uterine cycle 子宫周期
...腹肢编辑腹肢(abdominal appendage，abdominal legpleopod)是节肢动物的腹部附肢。但在昆虫中，腹部附肢表现为显著变形、退化，所以特别作为问题来研究。无翅昆虫的一部分(如衣鱼类)，腹足是以相当原始的形态残留于.
apparent-energy meter 表观能量计appendage pump 备用泵appendicitis tablet 阑尾消炎片

entry.def: An appendage is something that is joined to or connected with something larger or more important.

example.ex: ...the growing demand in Wales for recognition that it was not just an appendage to England...
example.tran: 有越来越多的威尔士人要求得到认可，即威尔士不只是英格兰的附属

example.ex: Macmillan must have loathed being judged as a mere appendage to domestic politics.
example.tran: 麦克米伦肯定极不喜欢只被当成国内政治的附属品。

means.word_mean: 1. an external body part that projects from the body;

sentences.sentence: "it is important to keep the extremities warm"

means.word_mean: 2. a natural prolongation or projection from a part of an organism either animal or plant;
3. a part that is joined to something larger

auth_sentence.content: A strong suspicion of nose-paint about the nasal appendage.
auth_sentence.res_content: A strong suspicion of nose-paint about the nasal appendage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A strong suspicion of nose-paint about the nasal appendage.

auth_sentence.content: Clothing, another necessary Appendage of Life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Clothing, another necessary Appendage of Life.

auth_sentence.content: Confirmation...ever was a constant appendage to Baptism.
auth_sentence.res_content: Confirmation...ever was a constant appendage to Baptism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Confirmation...ever was a constant appendage to Baptism.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 名词或动词后缀,表示"状态,总称"; 2. [做的]状态,过程; 3. 名词后缀,表示"费用"; 4. 名词后缀,表示"场所,物品"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dam+age状态,总称→n.损害,伤害
carry携带,运送+age费用→carriage运费
post邮件+age费用→n.邮资
rail铁路+age费用→n.铁路运输,铁路运费
tow拖+age费用→n.拖[船,车]费
water水+age费用→n.水路运输,水运费
anchor铁锚+age场所,物品→n.停泊地点;抛锚地点
append附加+age表示名词→n.附加物
bever饮,喝+age场所,物品→n.[水,酒等之外的]饮料
cot小床,小屋+age场所→cottage村舍,小屋
herit继承+age场所,物品→n.遗产,继承物;传统
hermit隐居士+age场所,物品→n.隐居处
lug拖拉+age物品→需要拖运的物品→luggage行李,皮箱
vill茅屋+age场所,物品→n.村,村庄
wreck残骸+age场所,物品→n.残骸,碎片

stems_affixes.value_cn: 优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad+vant=van前卫,先锋+age状态,总称→n.优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
dot打点,打盹+age状态,总称→n.老年糊涂,溺爱
drain排干+age状态,总称→n.排水;下水道
foli叶+age状态,总称→n.叶子[总称]
marry结婚+age状态,总称→marriage
mile英里+age状态,总称→n.里程
patron赞助人+age状态,总称→n.赞助,惠顾
percent百分比+age状态,总称→n.百分率
pilgrim朝圣+age状态,总称→n.朝圣
short短+age状态,总称→n.不足,缺乏
ton吨+age状态,总称→tonnage吨位
verbi=verb词语+age状态,总称→词的状态→冗长
vis看+age状态,总称→n.脸,面貌
pill抢夺+age状态,总称→n.&v.抢劫,掠夺
en进入+vis看+age[做的]状态→进入看的状态

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =expend,表示"花费,支付"; 2. 最初意思为"称重量而衡量……",引申出花费,支付; 3. =hang,表示"悬挂"

stems_affixes.word_buile: depend[v.[on]取决于,依靠,信赖,相信]+able可以……的→adj.可依赖的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 依靠的,依赖的,从属的;随…而定的
stems_affixes.word_buile: depend[v.[on]取决于,依靠,信赖,相信]+ent……的→adj.依靠的,依赖的,从属的;随…而定的
im进入+pending即将发生的→adj.即将发生的,逼近的
in不+dependent[adj.依靠的,依赖的,从属的;随…而定的]→不依靠[别的人,事或物]
pend悬挂+ing正……的→悬挂之中→即将发生的
per全部+pend悬挂+ic+ular表形容词→全部挂着的→垂直的
append附加+age物品→n.附加物
append[v.附加,添加,悬挂]+ix表名词→n.附录,附属物;阑尾,盲肠
pend悬挂+ant物体→n.垂饰,下垂物
pend悬挂+ulum东西→挂着[摆动]的东西→钟摆
per全部+pend悬挂+ic+ular表形容词→全部挂着的→垂直的
ex出+pend花费,支付→花钱出去
per全部+pend衡量→全部衡量

stems_affixes.value_cn: 花费, 消耗, 用尽
stems_affixes.word_buile: s+pend花费,支付→v.花费, 消耗, 用尽 v.度过, 消磨
ap加强动作+pend悬挂→挂上去→悬挂
de下+pend悬挂→附属于另一物件
sus在……下面+pend挂→挂在下面→悬挂
